textPlain: Does this have any relation to: https://github.com/vlcn-io/cr-sqlite ?Some of the API naming is similar (db_version, site_id, seq, commit_alter, etc), although the project source is very different (C rather than Rust, different feature set).crsqlite is no longer maintained so I might be interested in migrating.

2. How is row-level privacy implemented? Are "forbidden" rows not synced by the server logic, or are they encrypted?
